presons.text: boAt has been the biggest brand for Myntra in the Wearables category for years now! This has primarily been due to the sheer energy that the team brings to the table. The pace of innovation, obsession with quality and sheer audacity of its ambitions have always fascinated me. No wonder the brand is a global success! I’m sure that their journey is one that inspires many and this is just a beginning to what the brand will become in the years to come. Kudos to Aman and the team!
presons.name: RAHUL SACHDEV

presons.text: boAt Audio accessories were among the first licensing partners we associated with when we started our licensing vertical in 2019. They have created the exclusive CSK audio accessories line which has been received very positively by our fans. Our heartiest congratulations to boAt for completing 5 years and becoming one of the top 5 wearable brands in the world. Wishing Aman and his team the very best and we look forward to continuing this association for years to come
presons.name: VIJAY

presons.text: We are delighted to hear about boAt’s win as one of the top 5 wearable brands in the world. With a partnership of 5 seasons, LFW and boAt have brought some cutting-edge designer showcases. This includes the latest association with Masaba to launch the limited edition headphones designed by her. As a brand that’s constantly evolving, LFW has found resonance and a strong partnership with boAt, a brand that’s also pushing the boundaries in innovation. We congratulate boAt & look forward to the upcoming show!
presons.name: LAKMÉ

presons.text: boAt is very special to Appario as we partnered to grow this business manifold and learnt things together in this really rewarding journey of working together. boAt is a leader today as its passion, quest for perfection and speed of execution have always been top-notch, helping us provide the latest trends in Consumer electronics to our customers. We strive to learn from the 4 years of our association and look forward to the next decade of partnership

presons.text: We started our journey with boAt 2 years back and already feel like it’s a part of the Vijay Sales family. The brand is a major reason of our true wireless and overall accessories category growing. We are delighted to hear boAt is one of the top 5 brands in the wearables segment worldwide as per the latest IDC report. The fact that it is an Indian homegrown brand makes us even prouder. Can’t wait for boAt to become the No.1 brand worldwide in the wearable segment
presons.name: NILESH GUPTA
